node.statement: Step 1.1.1 (Quantum 3j antisymmetry): The quantum 3j symbol C^j_{m1,m2,m3}(q) with all spins equal to j (j odd) is totally antisymmetric under permutations of (m1,m2,m3), i.e., C^j_{sigma(m1,m2,m3)}(q) = sgn(sigma) C^j_{m1,m2,m3}(q). This follows from the quantum Regge symmetries of q-3j symbols and the fact that 3j is odd.
